R001.name: Northeast Region
R001.description: New England and Mid-Atlantic states with abundant granite

R002.name: Midwest Region
R002.description: Central states with limestone and quartzite deposits

R003.name: Southeast Region
R003.description: Southern states with limestone and granite availability

R004.name: Pacific Northwest Region
R004.description: Washington and Oregon with volcanic basalt deposits

R005.name: Southwest Region
R005.description: Arid states with granite and basalt availability
R005.climate: Hot summers, mild winters, low precipitation
